Class AStar

    public class AStar
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements iAStar
    A simple Fragment subclass.

      • onCreateView

        public android.view.View onCreateView(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                      android.view.ViewGroup container,
                                      android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        To create the view. We get all the information from the bundle and load it to use it later on. Also configure the deploy selection for the measure modes.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        inflater - Layout corresponding to the context.
        container - The view group.
        savedInstanceState - The bundle containing all the information.
        Returns:

      • loadBoard

        private void loadBoard()
        We load the pre-game board with information like the initial and final tile, we start the tutorial if its the first time executing the app, and finish the method.

      • createTable

        private void createTable(int[][] mapValues)
        The creation of the table with each tile as a text view and letters and numbers for the first column and row.
        Parameters:
        mapValues - the map information to process in the creation of the table.

      • drawPath

        public void drawPath(HeuristicPathTree heuristicPathTree)
        Method to control the whole drawing of the path once the algorithm finishes. Also, the user gets the constructor URL for the tree, and gets redirected to the git page in which the actual tree gets drawn using DOT code.
        Specified by:
        drawPath in interface iAStar
        Parameters:
        heuristicPathTree - the tree from which all the information is taken.

      • putNodesInfo

        private void putNodesInfo(android.widget.EditText et)
        Method to be able to show the weight of each node in the graphic tree.
        Parameters:
        et - The node which we are modifying to show the weight.
